TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UriBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides a custom constructor for uniform resource identifiers (URIs) and modifies URIs for the class.

span.span: Provides a custom constructor for uniform resource identifiers (URIs) and modifies URIs for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供便利的方式來修改的內容而不需要建立新的執行個體每個修改的執行個體。The class provides a convenient way to modify the contents of a instance without creating a new instance for each modification. 屬性可讀取/寫入存取的唯讀屬性，以便它們可以修改。The properties provide read/write access to the read-only properties so that they can be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別， ， ， ， ， ，和屬性設定為指定在`uri`.This constructor initializes a new instance of the class with the , , , , , , and properties set as specified in `uri`. 如果`uri`未指定的配置，則會配置預設為"http:"。If `uri` does not specify a scheme, the scheme defaults to "http:".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體以初始化屬性設定為`schemeName`和屬性設定為`hostName`。The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName` and the property set to `hostName`. 會初始化為值-1 表示預設連接埠，應該使用的配置，而屬性設定為斜線字元 （/）。 is initialized to the value -1 to indicate the default port for the scheme should be used, and the property is set to the slash character (/). ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含 URI 的執行個體http://www.contoso.com/。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI http://www.contoso.com/. remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體以初始化屬性設定為`schemeName`、屬性設定為`hostName`，而屬性設定為`portNumber`。The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName`, the property set to `hostName`, and the property set to `portNumber`. 屬性設定為斜線字元 （/）。The property is set to the slash character (/). 如果`portNumber`設為值為-1，這表示是預設通訊埠值`scheme`將用來連接到`host`。If the `portNumber` is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the `scheme` will be used to connect to the `host`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含 URI 的執行個體http://www.contoso.com:8080/。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI http://www.contoso.com:8080/. remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體以初始化屬性設定為`schemeName`、屬性設定為`hostName`、屬性設定為`portNumber`，而屬性設定為`pathValue`.The instance is initialized with the property set to `schemeName`, the property set to `hostName`, the property set to `portNumber`, and the property is set to `pathValue`. 如果`extraValue`開頭數字符號 （#），然後設`extraValue`。If `extraValue` begins with a number sign (#), then is set to `extraValue`. 如果`extraValue`加上問號 （？），然後開始設`extraValue`。If `extraValue` begins with a question mark (?), then is set to `extraValue`. 如果`portNumber`設為值為-1，這表示是預設通訊埠值`scheme`將用來連接到`host`。If the `portNumber` is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the `scheme` will be used to connect to the `host`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立包含 URI 的執行個體http://www.contoso.com:8080/index.htm#top。The following example creates a instance that contains the URI http://www.contoso.com:8080/index.htm#top. [!code-cpp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.UriBuilder6 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Fragment { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Fragment : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the fragment portion of the URI.

span.span: Gets or sets the fragment portion of the URI.
The fragment portion of the URI.

value.span: 片段識別項 （"#"） 會加入至片段的開頭。

span.span: The fragment identifier ("#") is added to the beginning of the fragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含片段中的標記 （#） 的 URI，包括標記本身的任何文字。The property contains any text following a fragment marker (#) in the URI, including the marker itself. 設定時屬性，片段標記加入至它的值。When setting the property, the fragment marker is added to its value. **請注意**版本 1.0 和 1.1 版的.NET Framework 中，設定屬性為任何值，包括`null`、 清除屬性，並設定屬性`null`或清除的屬性。**Note** In version 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, setting the property to any value, including `null`, cleared the property, and setting the property to `null` or to cleared the property. 在 2.0 版中，不過，和屬性無關。In version 2.0, however, the and properties are independent. **請注意**不將字串附加至這個屬性的直接。**Note** Do not append a string directly to this property. 如果長度大於 1，擷取為字串屬性值、 移除前置的井字號、 附加新的查詢字串，及設定組合的字串屬性。If the length of is greater than 1, retrieve the property value as a string, remove the leading pound sign, append the new query string, and set the property with the combined string. ## Examples 下列範例會建立 URI"http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#main"。The following example creates the URI "http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#main". [!code-cpp[Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic UriBuilder.Fragment Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Urihttp://www.contoso.com/index.htm#search和http://www.contoso.com/index.htm產生相同雜湊碼。The URIs http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#search and http://www.contoso.com/index.htm generate the same hash code. 雜湊碼的A 和 B，都保證會是相同 A.Equals(B) 時`true`。The hash codes for A and B are guaranteed to be the same when A.Equals(B) is `true`. 這個方法會實作 。This method implements .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Path : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the path to the resource referenced by the URI.

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the resource referenced by the URI.

value.span: 由 URI 所參考的資源路徑。

span.span: The path to the resource referenced by the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含伺服器用來解析要求資訊的路徑資訊。The property contains the path information that the server uses to resolve requests for information. 這通常是伺服器的檔案系統; 所需資訊的路徑雖然這也可能表示應用程式或指令碼，則伺服器必須執行提供的資訊。Typically this is the path to the desired information on the server's file system; although it also can indicate the application or script that the server must run to provide the information. 配置、 主機名稱或 URI 的查詢部分，不包含路徑資訊。The path information does not include the scheme, host name, or query portion of the URI. 屬性一律會傳回至少一個斜線 （/）。The property always returns at least a slash (/).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Port { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Port : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the port number of the URI.

span.span: Gets or sets the port number of the URI.
The port number of the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接埠號碼定義連絡 URI 參考主機的通訊協定連接埠。The port number defines the protocol port for contacting the host referenced in the URI. 如果未指定連接埠的 URI，一部分屬性會傳回 – 1，表示通訊協定配置的預設連接埠值將用於連線至主機的值。If a port is not specified as part of the URI, the property returns the value of -1 to indicate that the default port value for the protocol scheme will be used to connect to the host. 如果屬性設定為-1 值，即表示通訊協定配置的預設連接埠值將用於連線至主機。If the property is set to a value of -1, this indicates that the default port value for the protocol scheme will be used to connect to the host.

exception.span: The port cannot be set to a value less than -1 or greater than 65,535.

span.span: The port cannot be set to a value less than -1 or greater than 65,535.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Query { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Query : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets any query information included in the URI.

span.span: Gets or sets any query information included in the URI.

value.span: URI 所包含的查詢資訊。

span.span: The query information included in the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含 URI 所包含的任何查詢資訊。The property contains any query information included in the URI. 查詢資訊由問號 （？） 的路徑資訊分開，而且會持續到 URI 的結尾。Query information is separated from the path information by a question mark (?) and continues to the end of the URI. 傳回的查詢資訊包含前置問號。The query information returned includes the leading question mark. 查詢資訊會根據 RFC 2396 逸出。The query information is escaped according to RFC 2396. **請注意**版本 1.0 和 1.1 版的.NET Framework 中，設定屬性為任何值，包括`null`、 清除屬性，並設定屬性`null`或清除的屬性。**Note** In version 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, setting the property to any value, including `null`, cleared the property, and setting the property to `null` or to cleared the property. 在 2.0 版中，不過，和屬性無關。In version 2.0, however, the and properties are independent. **請注意**不將字串附加至這個屬性的直接。**Note** Do not append a string directly to this property. 如果長度大於 1，擷取為字串屬性值，移除前置問號、 附加新的查詢字串，並設定組合的字串屬性。If the length of is greater than 1, retrieve the property value as a string, remove the leading question mark, append the new query string, and set the property with the combined string. ## Examples 下列範例會設定屬性。The following example sets the property. [!code-cpp[UriBuilderSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/UriBuilderSample/cpp/main.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[UriBuilderSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/UriBuilderSample/cs/main.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Scheme { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Scheme : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the scheme name of the URI.

span.span: Gets or sets the scheme name of the URI.
The scheme of the URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出有效的配置名稱屬性。The following table lists the valid scheme names for the property. |配置Scheme|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| |檔案file|資源是在本機電腦上的檔案。The resource is a file on the local computer.| |ftpftp|資源是透過 FTP 存取。The resource is accessed through FTP.| |gophergopher|資源是透過 Gopher 通訊協定存取。The resource is accessed through the Gopher protocol.| |httphttp|資源是透過 HTTP 存取。The resource is accessed through HTTP.| |httpshttps|資源是透過 SSL 加密 HTTP 存取。The resource is accessed through SSL-encrypted HTTP.| |mailtomailto|資源的電子郵件地址，而且透過 SMTP 存取。The resource is an email address and is accessed through SMTP.| |新聞news|資源是透過 NNTP 進行存取。The resource is accessed through NNTP.|

exception.span: The scheme cannot be set to an invalid scheme name.

span.span: The scheme cannot be set to an invalid scheme name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: Returns the display string for the specified instance.

span.span: Returns the display string for the specified instance.

returns.span: The string that contains the unescaped display string of the .

span.span: The string that contains the unescaped display string of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示字串包含屬性值，如果屬性已設定，或指定的連接埠時已使用的建構接受連接埠號碼的參數，但大小寫不同的方法時.property 值設為-1 值表示預設連接埠。The display string contains the property value if the property was set or the port was specified when the was constructed using of the methods that accept a port number parameter except for the case when the .property value was set to a value of -1 to indicate the default port. 顯示字串不包含屬性值，如果未設定屬性，且連接埠不時指定建構。The display string does not contain the property value if the property was not set and a port was not specified when the was constructed. 顯示字串也不包含屬性值，如果建構函式的屬性或連接埠號碼設定為-1 值。The display string also does not contain the property value if the property or port number for the constructor was set to a value of -1.
